DOC.brief_summary: This study will examine the epidemiology (incidence and control of a disease), burden, clinical need, and treatment patterns of spasticity in patients with a diagnosis of Cerebral Palsy (CP), Multiple Sclerosis (MS), Stroke, Spinal Cord Injury (SCI), or Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI).
DOC.brief_title: Spasticity Registry Evaluating Epidemiology, Treatment Patterns and Clinical Needs
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of Cerebral Palsy (CP), Multiple Sclerosis (MS), Stroke, Spinal Cord Injury (SCI), or Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI) for a minimum of 3 months Participation in a spasticity clinical trial in the past 5 years.
